androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatTextV.android:text: (Whether in any form and for any purpose, write current value)
(Whether in any form and for any purpose, write current value)
(Current price in local currency should be written)
(3) Money accumulated for any future purpose like Hajj or marriage or building a house:
(8) Refundable security deposit of any kind:
(9) Money invested, mutual or partnership and profit derived therefrom:
(E.g. NIT, NDFC, FEBC (Zakat will be payable only on the original amount, although it is not permissible to purchase them under current circumstances))
(11) Financial documents or contributions converted into cash:
(eg draft, cheque, bill of exchange, all types of bonds, government securities etc.)
(13) Amounts received or contained in any other modern procedure (alternative to cash):
(14) The installments of the Committee (BC) which have been deposited so far and which have not been received by the Committee:
